attributes.action: prevent racist anti-immigration Australian politician Pauline Hanson immigrating to Britain, and to accept more Burmese and other refugees from authoritarian regimes instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister to ensure that racists such as the anti-immigration, anti-Asian, and anti-Muslim rabble rouser from Australia, Pauline Hanson are not allowed to immigrate to Britain, and instead more victims of tyranny, such as Burmese refugees, should be allowed refuge in this country

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
